q: Eric Schmidt dodges talk of becoming future Apple CEO Google chairman Eric Schmidt is sidestepping discussion of whether he might become the next Apple CEO. In the first place, it's not appropriate. Steve[ Jobs] is still the CEO and I hope he continues forever, Eric Schmidt told CNBC in a Monday interview.
